response.original_title: Aimer: Open α Door (Limited Edition Bonus)
response.overview: Aimer brings an original full-length album including "Zankyo Sanka" ("Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Yukaku Hen"), "Deep down" ("Chainsawman"), "Oaiko" ("Ohkami-chan to Ohkami-kun ni wa Damasarenai"), "escalate" ("NieR:Automata Ver1.1a") and newly written songs for this album. This edition comes with two bonus Blu-ray discs featuring the live performance "Aimer 10th Anniversary Final "Cycle de 10 ans"" at Osaka-Jo Hall in 2022 and music video(s). Special box packaging. Also includes original jigsaw puzzle.
response.title: Aimer: Open α Door (Limited Edition Bonus)
